OLEV Documents

Claim the OLEV Grant

Do you want to reduce the cost of your chargepoint by £500, by claiming the OLEV Grant?

Find out if I am eligible

You need to qualify for all of the below criteria in order to be eligible for the OLEV grant.

I ordered, own or lease an electric vehicle

My Vehicle was purchased after the 1st of April 2015
(If the vehicle is a company car, a letter from the company is required as evidence)

I have private, off-street parking at my domestic property

The cable, when run from the chargepoint to the car, will not cross a public right of way

Skip (Close panel, I don't want to claim)

Find out if I am eligible
